name: Canya: The Seriy Dayn (Development Forever)
description:
This game tells the story of a Sergei who has awakened an ancient evil trying to survive.

While driving through the woods to town, Sergei gets stuck in the forest. Trying to find help, he doesn't realize what kind of force he has brought upon himself. But? Why can't he escape? Maybe someone is just playing with him? But he has to find out everything and run away.

If you find bugs contact us

email: devforever.software@gmail.com
